'''Signs of Evil''' is the first act of [[Chongyun]]'s [[Hangout Event]]. In order to unlock this quest line, the player needs 2 [[Story Key]]s, must have completed [[Prologue]] Act III: [[Song of the Dragon and Freedom]], and reached [[Adventure Rank]] 26.

==Description==
You arrive in Liyue and encounter a young thaumaturge looking for information about evil spirits.
